short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Helper is an extension that allows you to repeat skip etc when specific buttons are pressed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to enter keyboard shortcuts to navigate through YouTube videos. 

The keyboard shortcuts will be visible when you click on the extension's icon.
